amendment.description: An amendment numbered 68 printed in House Report 115-830 to prohibit funds to be used to limit outreach programs administered by the Smithsonian Institution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A062) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A062) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.
